meanings.definition: A small partitioned-off area of a room, especially one containing a desk.
meanings.sent1: In the office, each employee works in their own cubicle.
meanings.sent2: The cubicles in the library provide quiet spaces for studying.
meanings.sent3: The cubicles at the zoo were designed for the monkeys to play in.
meanings.sent4: The cubicles in the beehive are meticulously organized and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The cubicles in the classroom help students focus on their work.

meanings.definition: A small, separate room or compartment.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room had a cozy cubicle for reading.
meanings.sent2: The tiny cabin in the woods served as a peaceful cubicle for the writer.
meanings.sent3: The cubicle in the treehouse was the perfect hideout for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The cubicle under the stairs was filled with forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent5: The cubicle in the garden shed was a peaceful retreat for the artist.
